name: FreakOut: Extreme Freeride
description: The steepest slopes, thrilling stunts and dangerous action provide a most excellent skiing experience. At an altitude of 2000 metres, far away from civilization, in a battle between you and nature.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows ME / Windows 98 / Windows 2000 / Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.8 GHz or better Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card 64MB+
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows ME / Windows 98 / Windows 2000 / Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card 128MB+

reviews.review_text: this game is realy fun and realy nice :) however this is not a game for the new and stylish skiers
